# fixed(_:)

**Type Method**

Creates a space equivalent to the specified number of points.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func fixed(_ fixedSpacing: CGFloat) -> Self
```

## Creating spacing

- **flexible(_:)**: Creates a space equivalent to or greater than the specified number of points, depending on the available space.
